info.name: Bachelor Mess Manager API
info.description:
Production-ready API collection aligned with all backend route files.

**Route files covered:** auth.js, meals.js, bazar.js, dashboard.js, users.js, analytics.js, activity.js, statistics.js, userStats.js, superAdmin.js, uiConfig.js, monitoring.js; plus server.js health/docs.

**Setup:**
- Set BASE_URL (e.g. https://api.yourdomain.com for production). Use Postman Environments for dev/staging/prod.
- Run "Login User" first; AUTH_TOKEN and USER_ID are auto-saved.
- For path params (e.g. :mealId, :bazarId), set the matching collection variable from API responses.

**Sections match route files:** 1 Auth, 2 Meals, 3 Bazar, 4 Dashboard, 5 Users, 6 Analytics, 7 Activity, 8 Statistics, 9 User Stats, 10 Super Admin, 11 UI Config, 12 Monitoring, 13 Health Check.

request.description: Authenticate user and get access token

exec: } catch (e) { /* ignore parse errors on non-JSON or error responses */ }

request.description: Get new access token using refresh token
Verify if current token is valid
Reset password using token from forgot-password email. Set RESET_TOKEN variable from email link/query param.

Submit daily meal entries. Note: Each user can only create one meal entry per day. If an entry already exists for the date, you must use the PUT /api/meals/:mealId endpoint to update it. Users can update their meal entry once per day.
Get all meal entries (admin access required)
Get specific meal entry by ID
Approve multiple meals at once (admin only)
Submit bazar (grocery) entry with receipt. Note: Use form-data for file upload.
Same as GET /bazar; alternate path GET /api/bazar/user (bazar.js)
Get all bazar entries (admin access required)
Get specific bazar entry by ID
Approve multiple bazar entries at once (admin only)
Get bazar summary grouped by category (admin only)

item.name: Admin: Create Bazar for Any User

request.description: Admin can create bazar entry for any user
Admin can update any bazar entry
Admin can delete any bazar entry
Admin can perform bulk operations on bazar entries
Get combined dashboard data including stats and activities
Get statistics for a specific user
Get all users with pagination (admin/super_admin only)
Get analytics for specific user (admin access required)
Get recent activities with advanced filtering
Get current month meals with statistics
Get activity by ID (supports meal, bazar, or user activities)
Get monthly report (month and year query params required)
Get comprehensive user dashboard statistics including meals, bazar, and payments. Returns total meals count (sum of breakfast + lunch + dinner), not just entry count.
Get detailed meal statistics for current user. Returns totalMeals as sum of individual meals (breakfast + lunch + dinner), not just entry count.
Get detailed bazar statistics for current user
Get payment-related statistics for current user
Get system overview for super admins
Get all users with pagination and filters
Get detailed information about specific user

item.name: 12. Monitoring
item.description: System monitoring and health check endpoints

request.description: Detailed health check with system information (mounted at root, not under /api)

variable.description: API base URL. Production: https://api.yourdomain.com. Use Environments for dev/staging/prod.
API path prefix. Usually /api. Set empty if API is at root.
JWT access token. Auto-set after Login User.
Refresh token. Auto-set after Login User.
Current user ID. Auto-set after Login. Use for users/:id or set 'id' variable.
Meal ID for /meals/:mealId. Set 'mealId' from Get User Meals response.
Bazar ID for /bazar/:bazarId. Set 'bazarId' from Get User Bazar response.
Path param for users/:id, activity/:id. Set to USER_ID for user endpoints.
Path param for /meals/:mealId. Set from Get User Meals or use MEAL_ID.
Path param for /bazar/:bazarId. Set from Get User Bazar or use BAZAR_ID.
Path param for /ui-config/:configId. Set from Get All Configurations response.
Path param for /monitoring/backups/:fileName/restore and /verify. Set from Get Backup List.
Token from forgot-password email. Required for Reset Password request body.
